text: tirumanam marrivekkappetta a munnalukalkkum avan ‎mappekiyirikkunnu. bhumi ere visalamayirunnittukuti atavarkk ‎itunniyatayittirnnupa. tannalute manas'sukaltinne avarkkta ‎kadanabharattal durvhamayimari. allahuvinre pitiyil ninn ‎raksappetan avanilttunne abhayam tetalallate marganamillenn avarkk ‎beadhyamayi. appeal allahu avareat karuna kaniccu. avar ‎pascattapiccu matannan. sansayamilla; allahu pascattapam dharalamayi ‎svikarikkunnavanan. paramadayaluvum. ‎
